2.2.0.name: wordpress/pressbooks
2.2.0.description: PressBooks is an open source book publishing tool built on a WordPress multisite platform. PressBooks outputs books in multiple formats, including PDF EPUB/MOBI, web, and a variety of XML flavours, using a theming/templating system, driven by CSS. For more information, visit http://pressbooks.com.
